channel.title: Diskutil on Steve's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Diskutil on Steve's Blog

item.title: How to Extend Free Disk Space for Macos
item.description: Extend disk with diskutils Delete partition “Free Space” to extend disk to current macos partition. Fixed Error “The new size must be different than the existing size” 1 2 3 4 5 #repair (internal, disk0 - in your case) diskutil repairdisk disk0 #resize (synthesized, disk1 - in your case with HS) diskutil apfs resizeContainer disk1 0 Reference Cannot resize APFS partition - “The new size must be different than the existing size”
